name: I am a Vampire
description:
A Game Boy game created for $104 Adventure Game Jam. This page will be updated later to not look ugly as sin I'm in a rush right now lol!

Game is complete but not polished to my standards. A polished "deluxe" version will be released outside the game jam's timeframe.

i_vampire.zip is a Game Boy rom that can run in any emulator or flash cart. Battery backup required to save.

CONTROLS

Arrow keys to move

Z = A button, interact

X = B button, back

Enter = Start, access inventory

Shift = select, save/load menu
